maps/autumn-fall/path-01.json/entities/5.orig: Looks like there used to be a village here, non?
maps/autumn-fall/path-01.json/entities/5.text: On dirait qu'il y avait un village ici auparavant, non ?

maps/autumn-fall/path-01.json/entities/5.orig: A long, long time ago.\. Literally Ancient.
maps/autumn-fall/path-01.json/entities/5.text: Il y a très, très longtemps.\. Littéralement à l'époque des Anciens.

maps/autumn-fall/path-01.json/entities/5.orig: The return of the Laser Bridge!

maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.orig:
\i[arrow-w] Road to \v[area.jungle.name]
\i[arrow-e] Tunnels to \v[area.forest.name]
\i[arrow-s] \v[area.rookie-harbor.name]
maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.text:
\i[arrow-w] Route vers le \v[area.jungle.name]
\i[arrow-e] Tunnel vers la \v[area.forest.name]
\i[arrow-s] \v[area.rookie-harbor.name]

maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.orig: Man I sure wish I could jump around like that.
maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.text: Rah, j'aimerais bien pouvoir sautiller partout comme ça.

maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.orig: Wouldn't that make exploration too easy?
maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.text: Ça ne rendrait pas l'exploration un peu trop facile ?

maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.orig: I guess...\. but how much fun would it be...?
maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.text: Sans doute...\. Mais imagine à quel point ça serait marrant !

maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.orig: Well, at least we can do our regular small jumps, right?
maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.text: Bon, au moins on peut faire nos petits sauts normaux, non ?

maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.orig: Oui, regular jumping whenever we want. It's at least something.
maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.text: Oui, des sautillements normaux à volonté. C'est toujours bon à prendre.

maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.orig: Have you ever heard of the \c[3]Old War\c[0]?
maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.text: Tu as déjà entendu parler de la \c[3]\v[lore.title.old-war]\c[0] ?

maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.orig: Hi!
maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.text: Salut !

maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.orig: 'Sup! You wanna know more about the \v[lore.unlock.old-war]\c[3]Old War\c[0] too?
maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.text: Yo ! Toi aussi, tu veux en savoir plus sur la \v[lore.unlock.old-war]\c[3]\v[lore.title.old-war]\c[0] ?

maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.orig: It's a pretty dark time in human history. Various colonies waged war against each other.
maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.text: C'est un passé assez sombre de l'histoire de l'humanité. Plusieurs colonies se sont battues entre elles.

maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.orig: They taught us resources were the trigger but I heard other stories too.
maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.text: Ils disent que la raison de tout ça était les ressources, mais j'ai entendu d'autres histoires.

maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.orig: Ah, don't worry! It's all in the past now. Like 1000 years past.
maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.text: Ah, pas d'inquiétude ! Tout ça c'est du passé maintenant. Genre, d'il y a \v[misc.localNum.1000] ans

maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.orig: Sure thing. I think it's taught on every ACF planet these days.
maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.text: Tu l'as dit. Je crois que c'est enseigné sur toutes les planètes de l'AFC maintenant.

maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.orig: I can't believe there was such a dark time in our past.
maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.text: J'arrive pas à croire que nous avions un passé aussi sombre.

maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.orig: From our perspective it all seems so distant.
maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.text: De notre point de vue, ça nous paraît si lointain.

maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.orig: Which is the problem, right? Humans tend to forget their past all too quickly.
maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.text: C'est ça le problème, non ? Les hommes ont tendance à oublier leur passé bien trop rapidement.

maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.orig: I don't know man, I mean we have had peace for so long now.
maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.text: Je sais pas, mec. J'veux dire, nous sommes en paix depuis si longtemps maintenant.

maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.orig: Depends on which colony you're on.
maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.text: Ça dépend sur quelle colonie tu es.

maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.orig: There really is a lot more water here compared to Autumn's Rise...
maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.text: Il y a tellement plus d'eau ici comparé à \v[area.autumn-area.name]...

maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.orig: I suppose they wanted to raise the difficulty.
maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.text: J'imagine qu'ils voulaient augmenter la difficulté.

maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.orig: Remember everyone: water is deadly.
maps/autumn-fall/path-02.json/entities/5.text: Souvenez-vous tout le monde : l'eau, ça tue.

maps/autumn-fall/path-03.json/entities/6.orig: I think C'tron and the others are waiting for you at the \c[3]First Scholar HQ\c[0], correct?
maps/autumn-fall/path-03.json/entities/6.text: Je crois que C'tron et les autres t'attendent au \c[3]QG des Premiers Érudits\c[0], non ?

maps/autumn-fall/path-03.json/entities/6.orig: You probably should go there before heading to \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0].
maps/autumn-fall/path-03.json/entities/6.text: Tu devrais y aller avant d'aller à la \c[3]\v[area.forest.name]\c[0].

maps/autumn-fall/path-03.json/entities/7.orig: I see you got the \c[3]\v[item.410.name]\c[0] with you! Nice, nice!
maps/autumn-fall/path-03.json/entities/7.text: Ah, je vois que tu as le \c[3]Symbole d'Étoile\c[0] avec toi ! Bien, bien !

maps/autumn-fall/path-03.json/entities/7.orig: Well then, good luck in \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0]! Beware of bugs!
maps/autumn-fall/path-03.json/entities/7.text: Bon alors, bonne chance à la \c[3]\v[area.forest.name]\c[0] ! Attention aux insectes !

maps/autumn-fall/path-03.json/entities/7.orig: If you want to pass the barrier up ahead you first have to collect the \c[3]\v[item.410.name]\c[0].
maps/autumn-fall/path-03.json/entities/7.text: Si tu veux pouvoir passer la barrière, tu vas avoir besoin du \c[3]Symbole d'Étoile\c[0].

maps/autumn-fall/path-03.json/entities/7.orig: You get it at the end of the \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0] dungeon in \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0].
maps/autumn-fall/path-03.json/entities/7.text: Tu l'obtiens à la fin du donjon du \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0] dans le \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0].

maps/autumn-fall/path-03.json/entities/7.orig: If you've already finished the dungeon... just revisit the \c[3]final boss room\c[0]. I'm sure you'll find the shades somewhere in there.
maps/autumn-fall/path-03.json/entities/7.text: Si tu as déjà terminé le donjon... reviens à la \c[3]salle du boss final\c[0]. Tu y trouveras certainement quelque chose.

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/6.orig: Thought Ah'd rest a spell here after all that awful cold an' heat.
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/6.text: J'pensais pouvoir m'prélasser un peu ici après c'froid de canard et c'te chaleur.

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/6.orig: Feels a mite familiar, t'be honest.
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/6.text: Et c'est qu'ici j'me sens un peu en terrain connu, pour tout t'dire.

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/6.orig: Well, how's the explorin' comin' along? Doin' good so far?
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/6.text: Sinon, comment qu'elle va ton exploration ? Ça s'passe bien ?

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/6.orig: Good ta hear! Y'all keep it up now.
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/6.text: C'est qu'c'est bon à entendre ! Continue comme ça !

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: Solve the quest "\c[3]Chase of the Hologram Frobbit\c[0]".
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Résolvez la quête "\c[3]Chasse au Grelapin Hologramme\c[0]".

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: Here comes the Bunny...\. that annoying bastard.
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Et voilà le Lapin...\. Cette satanée bestiole !

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: Hush Emilie, don't spoil it!
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Chut Emilie, révèle pas tout !

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: No spoiler. Just look at it jumping away! We all know it's gonna be annoying.
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Je révèle rien. Regarde un peu comment il sautille partout ! On sait tous que ça va devenir agaçant.

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: You got the Shade? Alright!
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Tu as le Symbole ? Très bien !

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: Nice!
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Cool !

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: You got the Shade? Nice!
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Tu as le Symbole ? Cool !

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: You should tell Emilie via D-Link!
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Tu devrais le dire à Emilie via D-Link !

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: I suppose you just got the Shade!
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: J'imagine que tu as le Symbole !

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: I think Emilie wanted you to contact her at this point, right?
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Je crois qu'Emilie voulais que tu la contactes à ce moment-là, pas vrai ?

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: Hi!
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Salut !

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: Bonjour Lea! How is it going? Did you collect the shade?
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Bonjour, Lea ! Comment ça va ? Tu as le Symbole ?

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: Très bien!
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Très bien !

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: That means we're all set for the raid!
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Ça veut dire qu'on est tous prêt pour le Raid !

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: But before that... there's one thing I wanted to tell you.
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Mais avant ça... je voulais te dire quelque chose.

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: You heard what the geezer in space said, right?
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Tu as entendu ce que le type dans l'espace a dit, non ?

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: With this new Shade you can now enter \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0].
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Avec ce nouveau Symbole on peut atteindre le \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0].

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: And well... that area is supposed to be a \c[3]jungle\c[0].
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Et bon... cet endroit est censé être une \c[3]jungle\c[0].

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: You know what you usually find in jungles?
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Tu sais ce qu'on trouve habituellement dans les jungles ?

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: Insects...\. like \c[3]bugs\c[0].
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Des insectes...\. comme des \c[3]cafards\c[0] par exemple.

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: I really don't want to go there by myself.\. So uhm...
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Je ne veux vraiment pas m'y aventurer toute seule.\. Donc euh...

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: It would be great if you could wait for me so we can enter the Jungle together, d'accord?
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: ... Ce serait cool si tu pouvais m'attendre pour qu'on puisse aller ensemble dans la Jungle, d'accord ?

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: Merci! You're the best!
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Merci ! T'es trop sympa !

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: But let's wait on that until after the Raid is over, alright?
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Mais attendons d'avoir fini le Raid avant, d'accord ?

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: Oh and now that we're all ready, we should meet up at the \c[3]First Scholars HQ\c[0]!
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Oh et maintenant qu'on est tous prêts, on devrait se rejoindre au \c[3]QG des Premiers Érudits\c[0] !

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: Lin wanted to give us a small briefing about the Raid and explain all the details.
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Lin voulait nous donner quelques infos sur le Raid et nous expliquer tous les détails.

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: Let's go!
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: C'est parti !

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: See you there!
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: On se voit là-bas !

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: Meet with the guild members at the \c[3]First Scholars HQ\c[0] to discuss the raid in detail.
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Rencontrez les autres membres de la guilde au \c[3]QG des Premiers Érudits\c[0] pour discuter du Raid en détails.

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: Hi!
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Salut !

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: Bonjour, Lea!
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Bonjour, Lea !

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: Morning!
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Bonjour !

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: The others already went ahead to the raid area.
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Les autres sont déjà partis devant, vers là où le raid aura lieu.

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: All we have to do is wander through this cave here.
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Tout ce qu'on a à faire, c'est de passer à travers cette caverne.

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: We still have some time left, though.
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Mais il nous reste encore du temps.

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: We should make sure we're well prepared.
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: On devrait s'assurer d'être bien préparé.

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: I wouldn't mind checking equipment options in Rookie Harbor one last time.
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Je n'aurais rien contre regarder encore un peu les équipements à \v[area.rookie-harbor.name].

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: Don't be such a worrywart, Tronny.
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Arrête de stresser pour rien, Tronny.

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: You know as well as I do that \c[1]Lea will just carry both of us\c[0].
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Tu sais déjà autant que moi que c'est \c[1]Lea qui va nous transporter tous les deux\c[0].

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: Lea!
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Lea !

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: That's true.
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: C'est vrai.

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: I'm ready to kick some derrière right now!
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Je suis prête à botter des fesses tout de suite, moi !

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: ...well, it's your call, Lea.
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Bon... À toi de choisir, Lea.

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: Meet up at \c[3]Para Island\c[0] in \c[3]Autumn's Fall\c[0] to start the \c[3]Raid\c[0]!
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Rejoignez les autres à l'\c[3]Île de Para\c[0] à \c[3]\v[area.autumn-fall.name]\c[0] pour démarrer le \c[3]Raid\c[0] !

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: Ah I see we're back in the Ancient ruins of puzzle village!
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Ah, je vois qu'on est revenu dans les ruines du village aux puzzles des Anciens !

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: Still serving puzzles even thousands of years later.
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Qui fourni encore des puzzles, même des millénaires plus tard.

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: Say hello to the hardest puzzle of the Playground!
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Dit bonjour au puzzle le plus difficile de tout CrossWorlds !

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: Huh? Isn't that one quite trivial?
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: Euh, hein ? Il a l'air relativement trivial, non ?

maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.orig: Sarcasm, Tronny...
maps/autumn-fall/path-04.json/entities/7.text: C'était sarcastique, Tronny...

maps/autumn-fall/path-05.json/entities/2.orig: Lea, that's the route to \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0].
maps/autumn-fall/path-05.json/entities/2.text: Lea, c'est la route vers le \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0].

maps/autumn-fall/path-05.json/entities/2.orig: You probably should first meetup with \c[3]Emilie\c[0] at the \c[3]First Scholars HQ\c[0] before you go there.
maps/autumn-fall/path-05.json/entities/2.text: Tu devrais probablement rencontrer \c[3]Emilie\c[0] au \c[3]QG des Premiers Érudits\c[0] avant d'aller là-bas.

maps/autumn-fall/path-05.json/entities/2.orig: Lea, that's the way to \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0]. We wanted to go there together, non?
maps/autumn-fall/path-05.json/entities/2.text: Lea, c'est le chemin vers le \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0]. On voulait y aller ensemble, non ?

maps/autumn-fall/path-05.json/entities/2.orig: But let's wait with that until after the \c[3]raid\c[0], d'accord?
maps/autumn-fall/path-05.json/entities/2.text: Mais attendons d'abord que le \c[3]Raid\c[0] soit fini, d'accord ?

maps/autumn-fall/path-05.json/entities/2.orig: Lea, that's the route to \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0].
maps/autumn-fall/path-05.json/entities/2.text: Lea, c'est la route vers le \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0].

maps/autumn-fall/path-05.json/entities/2.orig: I think you wanted to enter that area together with \c[3]Emilie\c[0] after you're done with the \c[3]raid\c[0], correct?
maps/autumn-fall/path-05.json/entities/2.text: Je crois que tu voulais entrer dans cette région avec \c[3]Emilie\c[0] après avoir fini le \c[3]Raid\c[0], correct ?
